meanings.definition: A mechanical device consisting of a flexible belt or chain wrapped around a series of pulleys or rollers to transmit motion or power.
meanings.sent1: The rolamite smoothly transferred power from one pulley to another.
meanings.sent2: The factory used a rolamite to move heavy machinery efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The rolamite at the gym made exercising feel like a fun game.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was a rolamite, driving her towards success.
meanings.sent5: The rolamite hummed softly as it transferred energy across the room.

meanings.definition: To transmit motion or power using a rolamite device.
meanings.sent1: They rolamited the energy from the wind turbine to the generator.
meanings.sent2: He rolamites the force from the engine to the wheels of the car.
meanings.sent3: She rolamites her enthusiasm into every project she tackles.
meanings.sent4: The music rolamited through the speakers, filling the room with rhythm.
meanings.sent5: The message was rolamited through the network to reach all employees.
